product_name: New Balance NX710 CardioTRNr Heart Rate Monitor + Fitness App
long_description: The New Balance NX710 CardioTRNr heart rate monitor + Fitness app boasts accurate performance that works hand in glove with smartphones and compatible gym equipment to track your workouts.
